regen.absent_element: detailed synchronization or validation checks for sensor status before execution
regen.new_specification: The system shall perform a synchronization check for each device sensor to ensure consistent status reporting across the system before executing any control commands.

regen.absent_element: error handling protocol for invalid sensor status
regen.new_specification: The system shall implement an error handling or alert protocol if a device sensor fails to achieve a valid status during degraded mode operations.

regen.absent_element: safety check for error handling during sensor level control
regen.new_specification: The system shall perform a safety check and initiate error reporting whenever a control command is issued at the device sensor level.

label: The system shall abort the device if the status is unknown.
absence: situation of the device status is unknown
